website_summaries.verdict: If you want to follow the DASH diet but still maximize your feeling of comfort food-goodness, the DASH Diet Slow Cooker cookbook is for you.
pros: Easy to read, with a nice variety of recipes
Tips on best usage of slow cookers, these are recipes the whole family will love without feeling like they're sacrificing flavor
cons: Some recipes don’t work well for all users
Others bemoan the lack of photos

customer_reviews.title: Pass this one up.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible cookbook. Since I received the cookbook on Friday (it is now Wednesday) I have made three of the recipes in the book, and all have had something wrong with them. They have needed additional spices/seasons, or adjustments because the end result was too runny, etc. There is eating healthy and there is eating bland. Unfortunately, this is about as bland as one can get, which is too bad because living alone and working full-time I rely heavily on the crock-pot for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: nd921

customer_reviews.title: A good, complete manual if you're interested in healthy cooking
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner in the art of cooking, I was looking to find recipes that would fit the entire family. The “Dash Done Slow” helped me understand a modern, yet healthy cooking style I was not familiar with. This book is easy and pleasant to read. It begins by explaining exactly what “dash” means, what to eat and what not to, to whom this diet is recommended and how it will help. I appreciate the fact the servings are clearly determined so you can understand how much of each ingredient to use. All the given recipes mention the calories, fats, fiber and protein intake in the end so you can easily know exactly what you’re eating and control your diet.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina APC

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pictures to make me want to explore the recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Very good book with good recipes. NOT enough pictures to help sell me on the meals... I would have liked pictures to see what I could be enjoying. The only pictures are the ones at the beginning of each chapter and those are not captioned. But again, good recipes!
customer_reviews.author: TheBaldEagle

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Book - Dash Diet Gotta Have!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 cookbooks for the Dash Diet - 3 that are for Slow Cookers or Instant Pots - which I plan to use with my Ninja Foodi. Of the 4 books - this one, "Dash Done Slow" is the very best! It has excellent recipe's with easy to follow instructions - but, it is also the only one that shows how much of each of the food groups you'll be using (daily allowance) with each recipe. Makes following the Dash Diet that much easier!! Love the book.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Sodium amount not listed
customer_reviews.text: Recipes do not include amount of sodium. Very disappointing as we are on a very restricted, low sodium diet.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybugnc44

customer_reviews.title: I use this to help with community wellness education- its great!
customer_reviews.text: The recipes include a macronutrient breakdown, and calorie count. They are all easy to make in your slow-cooker, and have provoked a great deal of interest from people who I work with that are looking for easy, fast, healthy recipes.
customer_reviews.author: April Rose

customer_reviews.title: Helpful slow cooker cookbook.
customer_reviews.text: I love slow cooker cookbooks, so when I recently had to start doing the DASH diet, it was helpful to me to find this cookbook to make no-fuss recipes. I think it will be very helpful. I have reviewed some of the recipes, and they appear to be easy and healthy..
customer_reviews.author: Readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes for any diet
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes for any diet. We've loved all the recipes that we've tried so far. The DASH diet is so easy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Koneck

customer_reviews.title: Ease ,flavor and health
customer_reviews.text: I love slow cooker recipes and due to the fact that I have had open heart surgery,this is great.all the recipes are heart healthy,easy to make,and so good.
customer_reviews.author: morninglory

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Excellent recipes, most are easy and has a wide variety of cuisines. My only complaint is that some recipes have over 600 mg of sodium per serving. I know that's still considerably less than fast food or most frozen foods, but it still seems high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult and cooking times seem wrong of some recipes (overcooked).
customer_reviews.author: James J. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Returned this item
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item - to me, the recipes seemed both complex and unappetizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jet M5

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: Run of the mill recipes with no real flavor. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: No lack of flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to follow recipes. seasonings and techniques are clear and recipes come out great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Slow cooker DASH
customer_reviews.text: Sodium content for each recipe serving would be very helpful in the nutrition breakdown. Looking forward to making many of the recipes in this book!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It makes you hungry if you can see it visually. Wish each recipe comes with a photo.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT DASH. Seriously, please look at the nutritional information before you made any of the recipes if you are doing DASH for health reasons. The sodium content in most of these recipes is WAY more than it should be if being labeled as "DASH". Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn S

customer_reviews.title: Great slow cooker recipes
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is wonderful -- whether you are really following the "DASH diet," or are just looking for some new, great slow cooker recipes. The recipes are easy to follow, and I did appreciate the information in the beginning of the book regarding what the DASH diet was, etc. We can all benefit from healthier eating, and I will be making quite a few of these recipes. The only issue I had -- which might be a plus for some readers -- is there was a large section on Vegetarian/Vegan dishes. I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Gibson

customer_reviews.title: ... family that has a history of hypertension it was good info. Gave a good idea of foods to ...
customer_reviews.text: This book has introduced me to the DASH Diet and coming form a family that has a history of hypertension it was good info. Gave a good idea of foods to eat and others to avoid. I am fairly new to slow cooking and this book gave a great overview. A lot of variety based on your food preference. So far I've tried two recipes and they were both tasty. The index page is helpful to quickly look for a recipe. I received this book at a discounted price for my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kemeisha W.

customer_reviews.title: .Dash Diet is real Eye Opener.... This is a Good Primer
customer_reviews.text: A reat primer to get me up and running with the doctor's prescribed 1500 mg of sodium a day diet for my husband's blood pressure. It has helped lower his bp along with the meds he takes. It took about 3 weeks of finding the food we were eating to be pretty bland before our systems adapted to such a dramatic change in sodium content. I was already doing "Low sodium" foods, but what an eye opener the Dash Diet is to the sodium in food, even low sodium foods.
customer_reviews.author: Raggedy Ann’s Friend

customer_reviews.title: Good and Healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Made one of the soups over the weekend. The recipe was good and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy J. Pehl

customer_reviews.title: This book is great. I have tried several recipes
customer_reviews.text: This book is great. I have tried several recipes, and the food was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G Weems

customer_reviews.title: I like to use what I have and not have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to use what I have and not have to buy a lot of extra items to cook with. Not a good selection of things my family would eat. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nora L. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of great recipes in this book with simple ingredients. Great book for people with high blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cookbook. I have made four things and all are good.
customer_reviews.author: kell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked more recipes. But it is well written and easily understood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cookbook if you don't need the nutritional content for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice cookbook if you don't need the nutritional content for salt per serving. As a HBP person salt per serving is essential in DASH eating. Returned this cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: dldyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I just received my copy. I don't understand why ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my copy. I don't understand why a DASH book would not contain sodium nutrition information for each recipe. Going to return
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn Porter

customer_reviews.title: the recipes seem to be easy to adapt to the current Weight Watchers guidelines
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't been able to try the book yet, the recipes seem to be easy to adapt to the current Weight Watchers guidelines. Also the flavor combinations sound very good. I will update when I try them in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Crock Pot Meals
customer_reviews.text: I use my crockpot all the time and always looking for healthy low sodium recipes. Seems to have a lot of them I would try and looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Cooking time whole lot less that cookbook suggests
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if anyone else noticed that the recipes calling for 8 hrs of low slow cooking really finished in 2 or 3 hrs. of low slow cooking??
customer_reviews.author: Gene D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes and easy to follow cookbook. It's nice to have quick and healthy meals.
customer_reviews.author: sbh

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Tummy
customer_reviews.text: Would purchase from this vendor again. Can't wait to make some the these mouth-watering recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Golden

customer_reviews.title: We've liked everything we've made out of it so far
customer_reviews.text: We've liked everything we've made out of it so far. My husband has even made some things out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: It's well explained and very interesting recipes but I've not tried any of them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Canelled order not cancelled
customer_reviews.text: I cancelled order and still received it. I had ordered hard copy and did not need digital - Amazon still charged me for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. ET

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great easy recipes. Nothing complicated. The dash diet is a great diet for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon LaMella

product_meta.title: DASH Done Slow: The DASH Diet Slow Cooker Cookbook
